languages.text: "Вы недолго у власти, вам простительно пока не замечать тревожных перемен. В {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g} распространяется культ Последнего восхода — не первая и не последняя ересь, поразившая сектор, но на удивление живучая. К системам Безбожных звезд проскальзывают таинственные конвои судов — банальная торговля с пиратами, не так ли? Но почему сами пираты об этом не в курсе?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Лорд-инквизитор спокойно кивает.{/n} "Справедливо. Что может знать скромный инквизитор, что неизвестно Вольному Торговцу? Что Культ Последнего восхода, с которым вы сталкивались, не погиб на Райкад Минорис и имеет ячейки в ваших колониях? Что он демонстрирует интерес к системам Безбожных звезд, куда регулярно уходят незапротоколированные конвои судов, трюмы которых, согласно документам, пусты?"

languages.text: "You haven't been in a position of power for long, and so one can forgive you for not noticing the troubling changes. The Cult of the Final Dawn is spreading in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — not the first or the last heresy that has afflicted this sector, but one that is surprisingly resilient. Mysterious convoys are sliding by, bound for systems in the Heathen Stars — just your humdrum pirate trade, wouldn't you say? Then why are the pirates themselves clueless?"
languages.original_text: "Вы недолго у власти, вам простительно пока не замечать тревожных перемен. В {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g} распространяется культ Последнего восхода — не первая и не последняя ересь, поразившая сектор, но на удивление живучая. К системам Безбожных звезд проскальзывают таинственные конвои судов — банальная торговля с пиратами, не так ли? Но почему сами пираты об этом не в курсе?"

traits.locale_text: "You haven't been in a position of power for long, and so one can forgive you for not noticing the troubling changes. The Cult of the Final Dawn is spreading in the Expanse — not the first or the last heresy that has afflicted this sector, but one that is surprisingly resilient. Mysterious convoys are sliding by, bound for the Heathen Stars systems — just your humdrum pirate trade, wouldn't you say? Then why the pirates themselves are clueless?"

"You haven't been in a position of power for long, and so one can forgive you for not noticing the troubling changes. The Cult of the Final Dawn is spreading in the Expanse — not the first or the last heresy that has afflicted this sector, but one that is surprisingly resilient. Mysterious convoys are sliding by, bound for the Heathen Stars systems — just your humdrum pirate trade, wouldn't you say? Then why the pirates themselves are clueless?"

Mysterious convoys are sliding by, bound for systems in the Heathen Stars — just your humdrum pirate trade, wouldn't you say? Then why are the pirates themselves clueless?"

languages.text: 「お前は権力の座についてまだ日が浅い。つまり厄介な変化に気がつかなくとも許してやれるというわけだ。最後の夜明け教団が{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}で広がりを見せている。異端が発生するというのは昔もこれからもこの星域の悩みの種だが、その教団は驚くほど打たれ強いのだ。謎の部隊が異教に歌われし星々の系を目指し、いつの間にか通過している。ただのありふれた海賊貿易だと言うのだろう？だが、なぜ海賊たち自身がその正体を全く知らないのか？」
languages.original_text: "You haven't been in a position of power for long, and so one can forgive you for not noticing the troubling changes. The Cult of the Final Dawn is spreading in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — not the first or the last heresy that has afflicted this sector, but one that is surprisingly resilient. Mysterious convoys are sliding by, bound for systems in the Heathen Stars — just your humdrum pirate trade, wouldn't you say? Then why are the pirates themselves clueless?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前は権力の座についてまだ日が浅い。つまり厄介な変化に気がつかなくとも許してやれるというわけだ。最後の夜明け教団が{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}で広がりを見せている。異端が発生するというのは昔もこれからもこの星域の悩みの種だが、その教団は驚くほど打たれ強いのだ。謎の部隊が異教に歌われし星々の系を目指し、いつの間にか通過している。ただのありふれた海賊貿易だと言うのだろう？だが、なぜ海賊たち自身がその正体を全く知らないのか？」

languages.original_text: "You haven't been in a position of power for long, and so one can forgive you for not noticing the troubling changes. The Cult of the Final Dawn is spreading in the Koronus Expanse — not the first or the last heresy that has afflicted this sector, but one that is surprisingly resilient. Mysterious convoys are sliding by, bound for systems in the Heathen Stars — just your humdrum pirate trade, wouldn't you say? Then why are the pirates themselves clueless?"

languages.text: “你实际掌权的时间并不长，因此我可以原谅你未能留意那些暗潮汹涌的变化。‘终末黎明’邪教势力正在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}不断蔓延，这并不是侵袭这片星区的第一个异端信仰，也不会是最后一个，但这个邪教却格外顽固。神秘的船队穿梭往来，飞向异端群星。或许你会认为，这不过是普通的海盗贸易而已，是吧？可为什么就连海盗自己，也对此一无所知呢？”
languages.original_text: "You haven't been in a position of power for long, and so one can forgive you for not noticing the troubling changes. The Cult of the Final Dawn is spreading in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — not the first or the last heresy that has afflicted this sector, but one that is surprisingly resilient. Mysterious convoys are sliding by, bound for systems in the Heathen Stars — just your humdrum pirate trade, wouldn't you say? Then why are the pirates themselves clueless?"

traits.locale_text: “你实际掌权的时间并不长，因此我可以原谅你未能留意那些暗潮汹涌的变化。‘终末黎明’邪教势力正在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}不断蔓延，这并不是侵袭这片星区的第一个异端信仰，也不会是最后一个，但这个邪教却格外顽固。神秘的船队穿梭往来，飞向异端群星。或许你会认为，这不过是普通的海盗贸易而已，是吧？可为什么就连海盗自己，也对此一无所知呢？”

languages.text: «Asumió su actual cargo hace muy poco, así que se le puede excusar el no haber notado los cambios más preocupantes. El Culto del Amanecer Final se propaga por la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. No es la primera herejía que aqueja al sector y no será la última, pero está siendo especialmente difícil de erradicar. Una serie de convoyes misteriosos pasan, camino de las Estrellas Paganas. Cabría pensar que es simple tráfico pirata, ¿verdad? Sin embargo, los propios piratas no saben nada de todo esto».
languages.original_text: "You haven't been in a position of power for long, and so one can forgive you for not noticing the troubling changes. The Cult of the Final Dawn is spreading in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — not the first or the last heresy that has afflicted this sector, but one that is surprisingly resilient. Mysterious convoys are sliding by, bound for systems in the Heathen Stars — just your humdrum pirate trade, wouldn't you say? Then why are the pirates themselves clueless?"

traits.locale_text: «Asumió su actual cargo hace muy poco, así que se le puede excusar el no haber notado los cambios más preocupantes. El Culto del Amanecer Final se propaga por la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. No es la primera herejía que aqueja al sector y no será la última, pero está siendo especialmente difícil de erradicar. Una serie de convoyes misteriosos pasan, camino de las Estrellas Paganas. Cabría pensar que es simple tráfico pirata, ¿verdad? Sin embargo, los propios piratas no saben nada de todo esto».

languages.text: « Vous êtes au pouvoir depuis peu, je vous pardonne donc votre ignorance des changements troublants qui s'opèrent. Le Culte de l'Aube finale étend son influence dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, et même si ce n'est pas la première hérésie à gangrener ce secteur, c'est sans doute l'une des plus résilientes. Des mystérieux convois font régulièrement route pour des systèmes des Étoiles Athées. De simples trafics de pirates, me direz-vous. Mais dans ce cas, comment se fait-il que les pirates eux-mêmes n'aient aucune idée de ce qu'il se passe ? »
languages.original_text: "You haven't been in a position of power for long, and so one can forgive you for not noticing the troubling changes. The Cult of the Final Dawn is spreading in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — not the first or the last heresy that has afflicted this sector, but one that is surprisingly resilient. Mysterious convoys are sliding by, bound for systems in the Heathen Stars — just your humdrum pirate trade, wouldn't you say? Then why are the pirates themselves clueless?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes au pouvoir depuis peu, je vous pardonne donc votre ignorance des changements troublants qui s'opèrent. Le Culte de l'Aube finale étend son influence dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, et même si ce n'est pas la première hérésie à gangrener ce secteur, c'est sans doute l'une des plus résilientes. Des mystérieux convois font régulièrement route pour des systèmes des Étoiles Athées. De simples trafics de pirates, me direz-vous. Mais dans ce cas, comment se fait-il que les pirates eux-mêmes n'aient aucune idée de ce qu'il se passe ? »

languages.text: "Ihr seid noch nicht lange in einer Machtposition, daher verzeihe ich Euch, dass Ihr die beunruhigenden Veränderungen nicht bemerkt habt. Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung verbreitet sich in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} – nicht die erste oder die letzte Ketzerei, die diesen Sektor heimsucht, aber eine überraschend widerstandsfähige. Geheimnisvolle Konvois sind unterwegs zu Systemen in den Sternen der Ungläubigen – gewöhnliche Piraten, nicht wahr? Warum wissen dann die Piraten selbst nichts davon?"
languages.original_text: "You haven't been in a position of power for long, and so one can forgive you for not noticing the troubling changes. The Cult of the Final Dawn is spreading in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — not the first or the last heresy that has afflicted this sector, but one that is surprisingly resilient. Mysterious convoys are sliding by, bound for systems in the Heathen Stars — just your humdrum pirate trade, wouldn't you say? Then why are the pirates themselves clueless?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid noch nicht lange in einer Machtposition, daher verzeihe ich Euch, dass Ihr die beunruhigenden Veränderungen nicht bemerkt habt. Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung verbreitet sich in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} – nicht die erste oder die letzte Ketzerei, die diesen Sektor heimsucht, aber eine überraschend widerstandsfähige. Geheimnisvolle Konvois sind unterwegs zu Systemen in den Sternen der Ungläubigen – gewöhnliche Piraten, nicht wahr? Warum wissen dann die Piraten selbst nichts davon?"

languages.text: "Kendini güç sahibi bir mevkide bulalı çok olmadığından sorun arz eden değişimleri fark etmemiş olduğun için mazur görülebilirsin. Nihai Şafak Tarikatı, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nde{/g} yayılmayı sürdürüyor. Bu sektöre tesir eden ilk kâfirlik değiller, son kâfirlik de olmayacaklar ancak şaşırtıcı derecede dirayetli çıktılar. Küffar Yıldızlar'a giden gizemli konvoylar tespit ediliyor. Klasik korsan ticareti gibi geliyor kulağa, değil mi? Öyleyse neden korsanların kendilerinin bundan haberi yok?"
languages.original_text: "You haven't been in a position of power for long, and so one can forgive you for not noticing the troubling changes. The Cult of the Final Dawn is spreading in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — not the first or the last heresy that has afflicted this sector, but one that is surprisingly resilient. Mysterious convoys are sliding by, bound for systems in the Heathen Stars — just your humdrum pirate trade, wouldn't you say? Then why are the pirates themselves clueless?"

traits.locale_text: "Kendini güç sahibi bir mevkide bulalı çok olmadı ve sorun arz eden değişimleri fark etmemiş olduğun için mazur görülebilirsin. Nihai Şafak Tarikatı, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'nde yayılmayı sürdürüyor. Bu sektöre tesir eden ilk kâfirlik de değil, son kâfirlik de olmayacak ancak şaşırtıcı derecede dirayetli çıktı. Küffar Yıldızlar'a giden gizemli konvoylar tespit ediliyor. Klasik korsan ticareti gibi geliyor kulağa, değil mi? Öyleyse neden korsanların kendilerinin bunlardan haberi yok?"
